excerpt: "Driving the news: AWS unveiled its plan to add new security checkpoints to the company's cloud products earlier this week during its re:Inforce conference. The company rolled out a machine-learning-enabled tool, called Amazon CodeGuru Security, that identifies and resolves any vulnerabilities injected during app development."
